name: Magic Click
description: Jagshemash! You like sexy time? I like sexy time too! I show you something. Here is magic click. You use this click, girls show shes vazheen and dance for you. Click-click-click! Very nice, very nice! You click often - the line of romance explosion go up! Wawaweewa! You buy this clicker, you get 10 animated girls with big plastic chests and shave down below in sexy poses. Click-click-click! Elf girl, nun girl, slave-raccoon girl, honey rabbit girl and many others are await to meeting you!! Greatest achievement of all of the glorious Kazakhstani's game dev! You can play this game even if your brother bit your hands off - you need no hands to play! Make girl happy, give her money or give her nice ring and she will take her cloth for you, you don’t press nothing! Chenquieh. High five! Great success!
